title: Two Truths and a Lie! Josh Allen or Lamar Jackson MVP? Who Will Win the NFC East?  | The Scramble
description:
This week, Sheil is joined by The Ringer’s Lindsay Jones to play two truths and a lie with early NFL storylines. They discuss who will be the most likely MVP (6:00), whether the Cowboys will make the playoffs (11:00), and what Zach Wilson will look like (16:00). Finally, they close the show by answering your mailbag questions (31:00).
Do you have a question for Sheil? Email TheScrambleMailbag@Gmail.com for a chance to have your question answered on the show.
Host: Sheil Kapadia
Guest: Lindsay Jones
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
Additional Production Supervision: Conor Nevins and Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
